com.johnsproject.jpos.graphics

Class ScenePaint.LineData

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.johnsproject.jpos.graphics.ScenePaint.LineData
  • Enclosing class:
    ScenePaint

    class ScenePaint.LineData
extends java.lang.Object
    The LineData contains all data of a Line that will be drawn on this ScenePaint, it will be drawn using Graphics.drawLine(int, int, int, int) with ( x1, y1, x2, y2) and with the Color equals to color.
